long_description: The thickest neoprene jacket from NRS, the HydroSkin(R) 1.5 Jacket offers substantial warmth for paddling in chilly waters without feeling bulky or restrictive. Convenient front-entry zipper makes the HydroSkin 1.5 Jacket easy to put on or take off as conditions change. 1.5mm Terraprene(TM) neoprene with heat-reflecting titanium cuts the chill on cool days, and soft VaporLoft(TM) fleece lining adds warmth and dries quickly. 4-way-stretch exterior allows unrestricted movement, and paddler-specific design allows unrestricted freedom of movement and puts seams where they won't cause irritation. 0.5mm spandex fabric under the arms reduces bunching for comfortable paddling. Durable water repellent exterior coating sheds water to help reduce evaporative cooling. The men's NRS HydroSkin 1.5 Jacket offer a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: The thickest neoprene jacket from NRS, the HydroSkin(R) 1.5 Jacket offers substantial warmth for paddling in chilly waters without feeling bulky or restrictive.
